name: Wasif Khan
bio: A passionate full-stack web developer with a love for clean design and modern technologies.

experience.title: Full Stack Development Intern
experience.description: Built responsive web apps with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, enhancing user engagement. Developed scalable backend services using Node.js and Express.js for seamless integration. Optimized full-stack code to boost performance and reduce load times. â€¢ Managed version control and team collaboration using Git.

experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: Developed a responsive website for a restaurant using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented features like menu display, reservation form, and contact information. Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance for a seamless user experience.

experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: Contributed to a team project focused on developing a responsive website for a restaurant. Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create an engaging user interface. Collaborated with team members to implement features such as menu display, reservation form, and contact information. Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance for a seamless user experience.

hobbies.name: Reading
hobbies.description: Exploring new worlds and ideas through books.

hobbies.name: Coding
hobbies.description: Building digital solutions and exploring technology.

goals.title: Master ElectronJS
goals.description: Deepen understanding of ElectronJS and best practices.

goals.title: Contribute to Open Source
goals.description: Make meaningful contributions to open source projects.

projects.title: MedPredict- Multiple Disease Detection System
projects.description: Built a robust disease prediction system using advanced machine learning algorithms such as Random Forest with ACO, Hybrid Logistic Regression + Decision Trees, SVM, and Stacked Ensemble Models. Developed a secure and intuitive interface using React enabling smooth patient data entry and displaying real-time disease predictions. Focused on model accuracy, data privacy, and user experience, ensuring trustworthy and actionable health insights.

projects.title: GenAi - Al Image Generator Web App
projects.description: Developed an Al image generator using Stable Diffusion Model. Tracked generated image history for users with MongoDB. Integrated Hugging Face Inference API for Al image generation.

projects.title: Digital Guest Onboarding System
projects.description: Developed a role-based system with separate panels for Main Admin and Guest Admin. Added JWT auth, bcrypt encryption, and QR code-based guest data collection. Enabled guest data CRUD, editable records, and printable reports with Express.js backend.
